mapper.select: select a.* , t2.ProjectName as ProjectIDLinkText, t5.TeamName as TeamIDLinkText, t6.real_name as CreateUserIDLinkText, t7.dict_label as StatusLinkText from ach_software a left join Aud_Project t2 on a.ProjectID = t2.ProjectID left join PM_Team t5 on a.TeamID = t5.TeamID join sys_user t6 on a.CreateUserID = t6.user_id left join (select * from sys_dict_data where dict_type='科技成果状态') t7 on a.Status = t7.dict_value where 0=0 where a.SoftwareID = #{softwareid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into ACH_Software (SoftwareID, SoftwareName, SotfwareCode, CertifacateDate, Memo, ProjectID, TeamID, CreateUserID, CreateTime, Status) values (#{softwareid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{softwarename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sotfwarecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{certifacatedate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{teamid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createuserid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update ACH_Software set SoftwareName = #{softwarename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SotfwareCode = #{sotfwarecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CertifacateDate = #{certifacatedate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Memo = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ProjectID = #{projectid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TeamID = #{teamid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CreateUserID = #{createuserid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CreateTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} where SoftwareID = #{softwareid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select SoftwareID, SoftwareName, SotfwareCode, CertifacateDate, Memo, ProjectID, TeamID, CreateUserID, CreateTime, Status from ACH_Software where SoftwareID = #{softwareid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select SoftwareID, SoftwareName, SotfwareCode, CertifacateDate, Memo, ProjectID, TeamID, CreateUserID, CreateTime, Status from ACH_Software
